caption.center: TOM HOER AND MARVIN EARL, D/B/A MEXICO FARMACY, RESPONDENTS, v. WILLIAM

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM CIRCUIT COURT, MONROE COUNTY; RONALD R. McKENZIE, JUDGE.Page 536
opinion.attorneys:
David B. Rogers, Columbia, for appellant.

opinion.opinion_text: [1] Civil action seeking damages for goods sold and delivered. Judgment affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
